textBeforeTable: Productions Source: The LA Times  Make a Million. Speaking of Murder and Double in Hearts, and I Know My Love, The Ivy Green, The Seven Year Itch on Broadway. Other Broadway credits include She originated the role of Helen Sherman in 1952 in The Druid Circle one of 10 plays that she appeared in on the Great White Way between 1947 and 1959. On Broadway, Patterson debuted in An Affair to Remember. Patterson was a character actress best known as portraying Cary Grant's fiance in the 1957 movie "An Affair to Remember". The actress was a veteran of Broadway when she was cast as Lois, the socialite who would not make it to the altar with Grant in Neva Louise Patterson was born on a farm outside Nevada, Iowa, and was named for a friend of her mother's. Wife of James Lee Relations: d. Dec 14, 2010 Brentwood, California, USA ) Female b. Feb 10, 1922 Nevada, Iowa, USA - ( Performer
